verses.verse: The word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> that came to Micah<WH4318> the Morashtite<WH4183> in the days<WH3117> of Jotham,<WH3147> Ahaz,<WH271> and Hezekiah,<WH3169> kings<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> which he saw<WH2372> concerning Samaria<WH8111> and Jerusalem.<WH3389>

Hear,<WH8085> you peoples,<WH5971> all of you.<WH7181> Listen, O earth,<WH776> and all that is therein:<WH4393> and let the Lord<WH136> Yahweh<WH3069> be witness<WH5707> against you,<WH136> the Lord from his holy<WH6944> temple.<WH1964>
For,<WH3068> behold, Yahweh comes forth<WH3318> out of his place,<WH4725> and will come down<WH3381> and tread<WH1869> on the high places<WH1116> of the earth.<WH776>

The mountains<WH2022> melt<WH4549> under him,<WH6010> and the valleys split<WH1234> apart,<WH1749> like wax before<WH6440> the fire,<WH784> like waters<WH4325> that are poured<WH5064> down a steep place.<WH4174>

"All this is for the disobedience<WH6588> of Jacob,<WH3290> and for the sins<WH2403> of the house<WH1004> of Israel.<WH3478> What is the disobedience<WH6588> of Jacob?<WH3290> Isn't<WH8111> it Samaria? And what are the high places<WH1116> of Judah?<WH3063> Aren't<WH3389> they Jerusalem?

Therefore I will make<WH7760> Samaria<WH8111> like a rubble heap<WH5856> of the field,<WH7704> like places for planting vineyards;<WH3754> and I will pour down<WH5064> its stones<WH68> into the valley,<WH1516> and I will uncover<WH1540> its foundations.<WH3247>

All her idols<WH6456> will be beaten to pieces,<WH3807> and all her temple gifts<WH868> will be burned<WH8313> with fire,<WH784> and all her images<WH6091> I will<WH7760> destroy;<WH8077> for of the hire<WH868> of a prostitute<WH2181> has she gathered<WH6908> them,<WH868> and to the hire of a prostitute<WH2181> shall they return.<WH7725>"

For this I will lament<WH5594> and wail;<WH3213> I will go<WH3212> stripped<WH7758> and naked;<WH6174> I will<WH6213> howl<WH4553> like the jackals,<WH8577> and moan<WH60> like the daughters of owls.<WH1323>
For her wounds<WH4347> are incurable;<WH605> for it has come<WH935> even to Judah.<WH3063> It reaches<WH5060> to the gate<WH8179> of my people,<WH5971> even to Jerusalem.<WH3389>
Don't<WH5046> tell it in Gath.<WH1661> Don't<WH1058> weep at all.<WH1058> At Beth Ophrah<WH1036> I have rolled<WH6428> myself in the dust.<WH6083>

Pass on,<WH5674> inhabitant<WH3427> of Shaphir,<WH8208> in nakedness<WH6181> and shame.<WH1322> The inhabitant<WH3427> of Zaanan<WH6630> won't<WH3318> come out. The wailing<WH4553> of Beth Ezel<WH1018> will take<WH3947> from you his protection.<WH5979>
For the inhabitant<WH3427> of Maroth<WH4796> waits anxiously<WH2342> for good,<WH2896> because evil<WH7451> has come down<WH3381> from Yahweh<WH3068> to the gate<WH8179> of Jerusalem.<WH3389>

Harness<WH7573> the chariot<WH4818> to the swift steed,<WH7409> inhabitant<WH3427> of Lachish.<WH3923> She was the beginning<WH7225> of sin<WH2403> to the daughter<WH1323> of Zion;<WH6726> For the transgressions<WH6588> of Israel<WH3478> were found in you.<WH4672>
Therefore you will give<WH5414> a parting gift<WH7964> to Moresheth Gath.<WH4182> The houses<WH1004> of Achzib<WH392> will be a deceitful thing<WH391> to the kings<WH4428> of Israel.<WH3478>
I will yet bring<WH935> to you,<WH3427> inhabitant of Mareshah.<WH4762> He<WH3423> who is the glory<WH3519> of Israel<WH3478> will come<WH935> to Adullam.<WH5725>

Shave<WH7139> your heads,<WH1494> and cut off your hair for the children<WH1121> of your delight.<WH8588> Enlarge<WH7337> your baldness<WH7144> like the vulture;<WH5404> for they have gone into captivity from you!<WH1540>
